title: Patricia de Lille - Wikipedia
snippet: She was elected to Parliament in May 2019 and took office as a Member on 22 May 2019. On 29 May 2019, De Lille was appointed by President Cyril Ramaphosa as Minister of Public Works and Infrastructure. In March 2023, she became the Minister of Tourism and was reappointed on 30 June 2024.

title: Patricia de Lille :: People's Assembly
snippet: Patricia de Lille was appointed as Minister of Tourism of the Republic of South Africa on the 6 March 2023. She was reappointed on 30 June 2024. She was Minister of Public Works and Infrastructure from 30 May 2019 to 6 March 2023 She is currently ...

title: Minister
snippet: Patricia de Lille was appointed as the Minister of Tourism by President Cyril Ramaphosa in March 2023 and reappointed following South Africa’s national elections in May 2024.

title: Patricia de Lille, Ms | South African Government
snippet: In 1989, De Lille was elected onto the National Executive Committee of the Pan Africanist Movement (PAM).
